item.title: When is the best time to play your wildcard?
item.description: I scraped the website at the end of last season to get details on when the top players used their chips. I wanted to see if there was a clear pattern and see if there was a strategy I could learn…

item.title: Monthly Report: May 2017
item.description: This is my review of May 2017. I hope to make this a regular occurrence and I want to publish something at the end of each month. I’ve been putting this off for quite some time because it’s not where I want it to be but I’m just going ahead and doing it. You can call this the MVP…

item.title: Analysing the words I write in my journal
item.description: It’s like having a twitter feed just for yourself. The only negative (and not even a real negative) is the price of the Mac app: But honestly, I think it would be worth it - it’s a one off price, not a subscription. The only reason I haven’t made the commitment is I’m not sure I’ll still be on Mac in a year’s time…
